clanValuesList.title: Respect is foremost.
clanValuesList.description: No one has any moral right to insult anyone.

clanValuesList.title: The game is outside politics.
clanValuesList.description:
In the chat, we do not discuss politics or war. Not even in the slightest way.

If you need to talk about it, take it to private messages.

clanValuesList.title: Clan rules are clan rules!
clanValuesList.description: We adopt them democratically together. Some participate actively, some do not, but we vote and make decisions together.

clanValuesList.title: Exceptions to the rules.
clanValuesList.description:
Everyone's situation is unique, and we respect our members. Therefore, we say first and foremost, if you have issues with free time, let us know.

And in general, anyone who feels they might not have time to play, write to us. We have never ignored anyone.
